page.title: 12GREAT EASTON CHURCH
page.content: In our 12 km sq.there is only one Church.It is the church of St.John & St.Giles,Great Easton.The church was built 1002 years ago.The walls are made of flint,bricks & stones. It has two different kinds of windows, leaded light windows with bars & stained glass windows with mesh.The brick tower was built in 1928 as was the entrance.The tower has a clock & a weather cock.There are 27 pews with four blue kneelers each.The font has a new oak cover that was given by Barry Dawson in 1978.On the altar there are two candle sticks,a bible stand & a cross.Behind the altar there is a screen painted with 6 disciples each side of Jesus,also a rood screen supported by a beam.The safe room has a safe,chest & a wardrobe.In the wardrob there are the cloaks of the choir.The safe contains the silver.
